name: SUPERBUG (Plumicorn Digital)
description:
Put the pandemics of this world to shame in this colorful arcade shooter! Wreak havoc and sow chaos with blinding momentum. Compete for high scores and combos!

Download recommended. Feel free to submit feedback by pausing the game at any time, or join our discord server at https://discord.gg/4qz2fBs9uA!
